    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2065</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Factors that influence learning during a scientific field trip in a natural envionment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Faktoren, die das Lernen während eines 
wissenschaftlichen beeinflussen, fangen Reise in einem 
natürlichen envionment auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Facteurs qui influencent l'étude pendant un 
voyage de domaine scientifique dans un envionment normal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fatores que influenciam a aprendizagem durante um
desengate de campo científico em um envionment natural</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fattori che influenzano imparare durante il 
viaggio di campo scientifico in un envionment naturale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράγοντες που επηρεάζουν την εκμάθηση κατά τη 
διάρκεια ενός επιστημονικού ταξιδιού πεδίων σε ένα φυσικό 
envionment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Factores que influencian aprender durante un 
disparo al campo científico en un envionment natural</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a study which deals with the educational effectivenss of field trips</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">field trip</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Studie, dessen pädagogischen 
effectivenss auffangen Reisen beschäftigt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une étude qui traite les effectivenss 
éducatifs des voyages de zone</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um estudo que trate dos effectivenss 
educacionais de desengates de campo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è uno studio che si occupa dei effectivenss
educativi dei viaggi di campo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια μελέτη που εξετάζει τα εκπαιδευτικά 
effectivenss των ταξιδιών πεδίων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un estudio que se ocupa de los 
effectivenss educativos de los disparos al campo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fangen Sie Reise auf</string>
          </keyword>
